SELECT a.product_id as productId, a.name as name, a.price as price, (SELECT c.percentage FROM offers_register c WHERE a.product_id = c.product_product_id) as percentage, a.description as description, (SELECT d.name FROM product_category d WHERE d.id = a.product_id) as category, (SELECT e.photo FROM media_product e WHERE a.product_id = e.product_product_id ORDER BY e.media_id DESC LIMIT 1) as firstImage
FROM product a join product_branch_office b on a.product_id = b.product_product_id WHERE b.branch_office_id_branch_office = #{idbranch} AND a.status = 1
